definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)

sentences.english: The home team lost to the visitors 2 to 3.
sentences.chinese: 主队以二比三败于客队。

sentences.english: The home team is the best tonight.
But the home side held on in precisely the way it had not against Tottenham 10 days earlier.
sentences.chinese: 但主队没有像10天前对托特纳姆热刺时那样的表现。

sentences.english: He rambled on at great length but I couldn't make head or tail of what he said.
sentences.chinese: 主队虽然技术不错，也架不住客队合作得好。

sentences.english: The visiting team has lost to the local team 7-12 in the quarterfinal .
sentences.chinese: 在四分之一决赛中客队以7比12输给了主队。

sentences.english: Crystal Palace are his team, and he also adores watching David Beckham.
sentences.chinese: 他的主队是水晶宫队，他也喜欢看贝壳踢球。

sentences.english: The home team trailed by one point at half time.
I think he favors the host team.
At times they gain ground. But the defence of the home team is well-organized.
sentences.chinese: 他们时常逼近对方球门，但是主队的防守组织得很好。

sentences.english: The visitors mayhave dominated possession, but the hosts' back four stood their ground.
sentences.chinese: 客队的控球时间很长，但主队的四名后卫坚守阵地。

sentences.english: The home team broke the champions' winning streak.
sentences.chinese: 冠军队连连获胜的好运被主队打断了。

sentences.english: But at Stoke, the commentary box is very close to the home fans.
sentences.chinese: 但在斯托克，转播间和主队球迷挨得很紧。

sentences.english: The host team equalize ten minutes later.
Anyway, the host team seems to fight for the gold.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎么说主队好象是志在夺魁。

sentences.english: But, referee's some assign extremely the deviation home team, is very doubtable .
sentences.chinese: 但是，裁判的一些判罚太过偏向主队，很令人怀疑。

sentences.english: The host team lost the football game.

definition: Málaga, Spain/Malaga city in Iranian East Azerbaijan
Gijón (Asturian: Xixón), city in northwest Spain on the bay of Biscay
sports such as soccer, basketball and volleyball that use large balls/see also 小球[xiao3 qiu2]
to equalize/to level the score/to pull back the advantage
